Windlord::

Windlord saw Perplex left, he flew towards the ship. "Perplex could 
need help if he want face that devil..."

Windlord hoped that Aerotaur was in the ship,and the hawk liked check 
that all his friends were ok too, due that he flew towards the ship.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: I made a mistake! I forgot to send my mail stating that 
Perplex leaves to find Clash! So here is my rewrite of it:
> 
> BIC: Perplex: Windlord...I feel like something is wrong. Don't 
follow me, I'm going after Clash. I'll try to make it back okay.
> 
> Perplex runs off in the direction Clash went...
